thread.title: Beechbrook Capital aims to plug the funding gap

title: Beechbrook Capital aims to plug the funding gap
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Beechbrook Capital   Vince Cable founded the British Business Bank in 2012 Christopher Furlong/Getty Images Vince Cable founded the British Business Bank in 2012 Christopher Furlong/Getty Images James Hurley Enterprise Editor Published 20   small and medium-sized companies. 
Beechbrook Capital, which has provided finance for private equity-backed businesses, is planning a loan fund for the general small companies market. 
Paul Shea, managing partner at the firm, said: “We have been inundated with people asking to borrow money, particularly non-private equity-backed businesses, often family-owned, entrepreneurial companies. We have received numerous requests for funding of this type from accountants, solicitors and corporate finance advisers, who are acutely aware of the shortage of Subscribe now
